page_content: Provides curriculum and resources for vocational orientation in secondary schools.
Provides a quick guide on the key features of GeoShop BL, a geoinformation system.
Provides guidelines for exporting consumer goods and cosmetics, including required documentation.
Focuses on social pedagogy and forensics, aiming to promote personal responsibility among the participants.
Provides tools and guidelines for schools to establish rules for computer and internet usage, aiming to enhance digital literacy among students.
Discusses the use of SAP SuccessFactors as a tool for conducting annual employee reviews and provides various guidelines and instructions for its use.
